# source

**Instance Property**

The file to clone.

## Declaration

```swift
var source: UnsafeMutablePointer<es_file_t>
```

## Inspecting Event Properties

- **target_dir**: The directory that contains the cloned file.
- **target_name**: The name of the newly cloned file.
- **reserved**: An unused field reserved for future use.

items.description: The directory that contains the cloned file.
items.name: target_dir

items.description: The name of the newly cloned file.
items.name: target_name

items.description: An unused field reserved for future use.
items.name: reserved
